title: Permanately banned for 1 toxic game? Wow riot this is amazing...

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
I havent played in 1 year and I get some trolls in game, I rage unfortunately. They have clan names like nlgg4 and %%%%. racist crap. I get a perm ban... ?? 

Really? 

Account is from season 2 and I get a perm ban from 1 toxic game. How do i apply againts this or do i never touch this game again? 

How can you give someone a perm ban with no history?

replies.body:
Hey there,

To appeal a ban you can [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support, we here on the boards are unable to assist with account specific inquiries.

Would you be willing to copy your full unedited chat log (relating to the suspension) here? Maybe we can provide some insight as to why your behaviour caused you to be banned permanently.

Oh and after the game, 5 mins alter I get perm on the RE-QUEUE. 

Guys dont rage once in game because you can be the rare 0.00000001% that gets perm banned..
